amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Office of the Assistant Secretary for Civil Rights; tribal expansion grants; grants to socially disadvantaged farmers and ranchers; and Hispanic-serving institutions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds in the following accounts as specified: Office of the Secretary for Civil Rights, $250,000; Cooperative State Research, Education, and Extension Service--Research and Education Activities, $1.5 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Baca amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 205 - 209 (Roll no. 366).
